about_the_game:
In a realm ravaged by hordes of monsters, only you can build impenetrable bastions of magical towers.

Acquire new perks and items, experiment with evolutions and gear, and turn every new run into an even more chaotic experience.

Overcome 30 waves of terror and prove that even in the face of despair, there is still room for heroism.

Features:

  • 38 unique towers - specializing in damage, farming, buffs, or debuffs.

  • 22 characters - each with a signature tower and distinct traits.

  • 18 enemy types and 12 bosses - each with its own unique mechanics.

  • 37 items - that can radically impact the outcome of any battle.

  • 6 diverse maps - each with its own conditions and terrain.

  • Fast-paced runs of up to 30 minutes - to test your strategy in intense skirmishes.

  • Merge mechanic - allowing you to upgrade towers by combining identical ones.

  • Varied playstyles - from all-out aggression to carefully planned defense.

  • 40 achievements - that challenge your skills.

  • Metaprogression - unlocking new towers, characters, and possibilities between runs.
detailed_description:
⚔️ READY TO DEFEND? ROGUECRAFT DEMO AWAITS!

⚔️ Defend your city from relentless waves of enemies!
🛠️ Merge identical towers to level them up and boost their power!
🔥 Adapt your strategy and overcome escalating challenges!
📢 Join the discussion, share your tactics, and help shape the future of RogueCraft!
👉 Click ‘Download Demo’ above and jump into the action!
⚠️ This is just the beginning—more levels, towers, and challenges are coming! Your feedback will help us make the game even better!
🚀 Stay tuned and wishlist now!

name: RogueCraft

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or integrated Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10 / 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500 or equivalent AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Merge, build, and defend in this roguelike tower defense game! Face waves of enemies and epic bosses, evolve your towers, and unlock upgrades for endless replayability and tactical depth.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese
